attributes.action: change present policies and scrap the no blame policy adopted in our schools which is failing bullied childrenTH
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Silent Voice is an appeal for those who support changes to be made to present system in our schools regarding bullied children. The campaign seeks an Independent Regulatory Authority established to whom our schools are accountable which does not exist right now to protect our children and computerised pupil records where incidents recorded re bullying are easily accessed by Police and other authorities for severe cases, on consent from parents.
